terminalsdk
external/com.stripe.stripeterminal.external.callable/BluetoothReaderReconnectionListener/onReaderReconnectStarted

onReaderReconnectStarted

abstract fun onReaderReconnectStarted(cancelReconnect: Cancelable)
Content copied to clipboard

If set to true for BluetoothConnectionConfiguration.autoReconnectOnUnexpectedDisconnect. onReaderReconnectStarted will be triggered instead of TerminalListener.onUnexpectedReaderDisconnect

In your implementation of this method, you may want to notify your user that reconnecting is in progress. You can call cancelReconnect.cancel to interrupt the reconnect if you intended to. You will need to use onReaderReconnectSucceeded and onReaderReconnectFailed to listen the results of reconnection
